# ðŸ“Š Epic: Advanced Dashboard Analytics & Insights Platform

## Overview
This parent issue tracks the implementation of the next-generation dashboard analytics suite for Nexus, including visualizations, real-time activity, customization, benchmarking, and export/reporting improvements. Completion of all linked sub-issues will deliver a fully production-ready analytics dashboard for all users.

## Sub-Issues Checklist
- [ ] #dashboard-visualization-suite
- [ ] #dashboard-activity-feed
- [ ] #dashboard-custom-widgets
- [ ] #dashboard-comparative-analytics
- [ ] #dashboard-export-reporting

## Completion Criteria
- All sub-issues above are closed
- All features described in the original [Dashboard Analytics Enhancement](./dashboard-analytics-enhancement.md) spec are implemented, tested, and documented
- User guides and API docs are updated

## References
- [Dashboard Analytics Enhancement Spec](./dashboard-analytics-enhancement.md)
- [Dashboard Features Discussion](https://github.com/techySPHINX/Nexus/discussions)

**Contributors:** Please work on the sub-issues below. This parent issue will be closed automatically when all sub-issues are complete.
